scripts.w3o: npm run w3o-core && npm run w3o-antelope && npm run w3o-ethereum
scripts.w3o-core: cd w3o-core && npm i && npm run build
scripts.w3o-antelope: cd w3o-antelope && npm i && npm run build
scripts.w3o-ethereum: cd w3o-ethereum && npm i && npm run build
scripts.clear: rm -rf lib node_modules .angular; npm run clear-core; npm run clear-antelope; npm run clear-ethereum
